short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use IADB launcher to get quick access to your website and your admin, as well as some useful functions tied into your admin.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This plugin is intended for actors and filmmakers using IADB Actor Website services.
It will allow you to:
* Access your website 
* Access your control panel 
* Utilize shortcut for importing contacts to your control panel
* Preview recent blog post
* View system version
